items.title: Newcastle contact refs' boss over Chelsea call
items.summary: Newcastle United have contacted referees' chief Howard Webb over the controversial decision which denied them a potentially crucial penalty against Chelsea.

items.title: Sources: Man Utd delay Zirkzee exit decision
items.summary: Manchester United are set to delay any decision on Joshua Zirkzee's future until later in the January window, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Op deze datum gaat AZ de koker in voor loting tussenronde Conference League
items.summary: AZ speelt op 19 en 26 februari in de tussenronde van de Conference League. De ploeg van Maarten Martens viel net buiten de topacht, waardoor er eerst een tweeluik moet worden gewonnen om naar de achtste finale te gaan. Voetbal International legt uit wanneer de loting voor de tussenronde is.

items.title: PSV en Veerman wachten op Fener, mogelijke vervanger Sano peperduur
items.summary: Een transfer van Joey Veerman naar Fenerbah√ße is niet van de baan, maar wordt wel bemoeilijkt door de verdachtmaking door justitie in Turkije van Fener-topman Sadettin Saran. Intussen brengt PSV vervangers in kaart voor Veerman, maar weten ze in Eindhoven inmiddels dat het prijskaartje van NEC'er Kodai Sano torenhoog is.

items.title: ‚ÄòWe‚Äôve fallen behind‚Äô: why Germany‚Äôs biggest teams have split from DFB
items.summary: Ownership of Frauen-Bundesliga is being taken over by the clubs, who want to keep pace with game in England ‚ÄúThe reason we started this whole process was a fear of losing more and more the connection to the top,‚Äù says Katharina Kiel, the head of women‚Äôs football at Eintracht Frankfurt. Alongside her role at one of Germany‚Äôs more successful women‚Äôs football teams, Kiel was this month elected president of the new Women‚Äôs Bundesliga Association, after all 14 clubs agreed to split from the German Football Federation (DFB) and form their own committee to take ownership of the league to further commercialise and grow it, with the 2027-28 campaign a targeted start date. Continue reading...

items.title: Slot calls tackle 'reckless'; Isak out 2 months
items.summary: Liverpool head coach Arne Slot has described the challenge from Tottenham Hotspur defender Micky van de Ven which broke Alexander Isak's leg as "reckless."

items.title: Arne Slot accuses Van de Ven of ‚Äòreckless‚Äô tackle that fractured Isak‚Äôs leg
items.summary: Liverpool head coach claims tackle risked serious injury Record signing Isak out ‚Äòfor a couple of months‚Äô, Slot says Arne Slot has criticised Tottenham defender Micky van de Ven for the ‚Äúreckless‚Äù challenge that left Alexander Isak with a fractured leg. Liverpool will be without their record ¬£125m signing ‚Äúfor a couple of months‚Äù, Slot confirmed on Tuesday, after he was injured while scoring in the team‚Äôs 2-1 win at Tottenham on Saturday. Isak had surgery on Monday to repair an ankle injury that includes a fractured fibula. Continue reading...
